entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Saint-Quentin
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill minus 18 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24 except minus 28 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24 except minus 28 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 05 February 2023
